casebody.data:
Richard HARRISON and Kathy Harrison
v.
CITY OF SANFORD, A municipal corporation. No. 251P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 14, 2006. Norwood P. Blanchard, III, Wilmington, for City of Sanford. Thomas M. VanCamp, Pinehurst, for Harrison. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 627 S.E.2d 672 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of May 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th day of December 2006."
